title: Cant use an original username for summoner name (This is a person who just downloaded LoL)
body: So, after a lot of nagging from my brother, and listening to the amazing music LoL has to offer, (amumu{{champion:32}} , I'm looking at you) I finally downloaded league. I did all of the sign up and log in stuff and the final step is to make the summoner name that people is going to call you by. But the thing is, when I try to put in my **Original** username I used for a lot of years, it says "**We're sorry, The summoner name you selected is unavailable, please try again.**" which is different because when a summoner name is taken, it says **"Your summoner was not created because someone is already being in use"** and when my bro tried to search up my original username in the "friend search" in his own game, it was shown that nobody took the username I want to use. I'm just really confused and all help will be appreciated! {{item:2052}}

replies.body: Welcome to League!  As much as you enjoyed the Curse of The Sad Mummy, I don't want you to be left sad due to an issue like this.  I've taken your bait of poro snax {{item:2010}} and want to help!  What is the summoner name you're trying to setup?  There may be character restrictions or language filters that's blocking you from creating that name. More information on this can also be found on our [Summoner Name FAQ.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752814-Summoner-Name-FAQ)  Let me know!

Heya! It's me, but with my bro's account. apparently you have to be higher than lv. 1 to post discussions which I found weird because I somehow posted this...

I'm from 'Merica and the username I'm trying to use is **"SoThatGrass"**

Thank you for helping me!
Yup!  Your name is filtered because it has ass in it.  :P  Go ahead and make a temporary summoner name.  Let me know what the temp name is, and I'll make the adjustment personally for you!

Thank you!
My temporary summoner name is ProfessorDoctor

All set!  Your name has been changed, and it will also be updated on the boards after making a post or reply.  Welcome to league and best of luck in the Summoner's Rift!
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
It works! Thank you so much for helping me! :D
That pass though. lol. Account sharing op. I'm guessing it's fine seeing how he's new and stuff. I'm just messing around anyways because it's so heavily looked down upon. =P
